Parameter: Total Scope 3 emissions (Break-up of the GHG into CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3, if available)
Total Scope 3 emissions per rupee of turnover
Unit: Gram per CO2 per rupee income

Parameter: Total Scope 3 emission intensity (optional) - the relevant metric may be selected by the entity
